title: FlexPOS Pro
description: Portable POS terminal with Dual SIM + Wi-Fi, integrated 2D scanner, 8-hour battery life, and lightweight ergonomic design for mobile commerce.

title: TapPay Lite
description: Compact NFC card reader with USB-C interface, supports contactless payments, ultra-fast transaction speed, and plug-and-play connectivity.

title: BlueScan BT500
description: Wireless Bluetooth barcode scanner with USB charging dock, 10-meter range, long-life battery, and durable build for retail and logistics use.

title: PS3C Personal Shopper
description: Handheld smart computer with 4 GB RAM, integrated scanner, Wi-Fi support, and 5.5” touch display. Lightweight and reliable for in-store operations.

title: ReceiptPro X
description: Thermal receipt printer with Wi-Fi + USB connectivity, 200mm/s print speed, compact design, and high-capacity paper roll support for heavy usage.

title: PayStation Mini
description: Compact POS with 7” HD touch display, Wi-Fi + Bluetooth, dual SIM support, and secure EMV card reader. Optimized for small business checkout counters.

title: SmartRetail Kit
description: Complete retail kit with POS terminal, barcode scanner, and receipt printer. Multi-device connectivity, plug-and-play setup, and cloud integration ready.

title: CashMate 2000
description: Smart cash handling system with high-speed counting, counterfeit detection, large LCD display, and automatic batch sorting for secure transactions.

title: ScanGo Pro
description: Advanced barcode scanner with ultra-fast recognition, USB + Bluetooth connectivity, 1D/2D scanning support, and rugged lightweight design.

title: POS Ultra
description: High-performance POS system with octa-core processor, 8 GB RAM, multi-device connectivity, built-in Wi-Fi + Ethernet, and enterprise-grade durability.
